hero.label: Large Dataset Application
hero.heading: With a storage capacity of |data| that’s growing every day, the Filecoin network is uniquely suited for storing large datasets.

application_name.label: Unique name for this application

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

application_name.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

about.label: About your project and organization
about.placeholder: Briefly share your project and organization's history

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

about.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

funding_sources.label: Funding Sources
funding_sources.placeholder: What is the primary source of funding for this projet? Are there any other significant funding sources?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

funding_sources.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

ecosystem_associates.placeholder: What other projects or ecosystem stakeholders is this project associated with?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

ecosystem_associates.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

nature_of_data.label: Nature of the data
nature_of_data.placeholder: Describe the data that will be stored on Filecoin

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

nature_of_data.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

source_of_data.label: Source of the data
source_of_data.placeholder: Where is the data in this dataset sourced from?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

source_of_data.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

data_sample.label: Data sample
data_sample.placeholder: Are you able to share a sample of the data? Link to a file, image table, etc.

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

data_sample.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

frequency_of_retrieval.label: Frequency of retrieval
frequency_of_retrieval.description: What is the expected retrieval frequency of this data

duration_of_storage.label: Duration of storage
duration_of_storage.placeholder: How long do you intend to keep this data stored on Filecoin?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

duration_of_storage.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

geographic_distribution.label: Geographic Distribution
geographic_distribution.placeholder: Describe which geographical areas (countries, regions) do you plan on making storage deals in.

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

geographic_distribution.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

sending_data.label: Sending data
sending_data.placeholder: How will you be distributing your data to storage providers? Is there an offline data transfer process?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

sending_data.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

storage_provider_selection_plan.label: Storage provider selection plan
storage_provider_selection_plan.placeholder: How do you plan on selecting the storage providers with whom you will be making deals? This should include a plan to ensure the data is retrievable in the future, by you an others

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

storage_provider_selection_plan.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

replication_plan.label: Replication plan
replication_plan.placeholder: How will you be distributing deals across different storage providers?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

replication_plan.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore

immediacy.label: Immediacy
immediacy.placeholder: Do you have the resources and funding to start making deals as soon as you receive DataCap? What support from the community would help you onboard your data onto Filecoin?

validation_message.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters

immediacy.default_value: This is a test application, please ignore
